entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
